Associative Memory research covers technologies enabling implementation of associative memory which enables thought process and links previous experience to novel situations.

== Technologies ==

  * Kohonen networks

== Types of Associations ==

Feel the difference between:

  * Clear concept can be restored from noisy data
  * Most related concept can be restored by its small part
  * Several concepts can be derived from feature/another concept
